name: 4x4 ATV Rider Quad Bike Hill Climb Extreme Offroad Safari Riding
name_original: 4x4 ATV Rider Quad Bike Hill Climb Extreme Offroad Safari Riding
description:
Looking out for best transporter game then you search ends here. ATV Rider Quad Bike game thrills you with the feel of transporter games. This is extremely fun and parking mania game for the game lovers designed perfectly with 3d graphics
GAME FEATURES:-
1 Designed with 3D environments
2 Interesting and challenging levels coming up
3 Customized controls of your choice displayed on the screen
4 Addictive game play
5 Accurate sound effects
6 Transparency visual effects displayed on screen

How to Play:- Tap your iPhone/iPad on right side to drive / brake.Tap on left to control steering.
